author: David Brennan
title: China Claims U.S. Is 'Slandering' Beijing With Report on Coronavirus Cover-Up, Calls Trump Administration 'Inhumane'
description: China has been accused of silencing whistle-blowers and covering up the scale of infections and deaths inside the country.
content: The Chinese Foreign Ministry has hit out at a U.S. intelligence report suggesting Beijing is covering up the true scale of its coronavirus outbreak, claiming again that the White House is politicizing the crisis to try and divert attention from its slow respo… [+2972 chars]
